DOC.brief_title: Do Patients With Chronic Daily Headache Have Continuous Headache Moments Headache Relief ?
DOC.detailed_description: This study retrospective chart review patient age 18 see co-investigator one initial , routine follow visit , diagnosis chronic migraine , chronic tension type headache , new daily persistent headache , chronic post traumatic headache ( per International Headache Classification II guidelines6 ) . Patients diagnosis routine care ask five standard question headache co-investigator , response record patient 's medical record ( see question sheet attach ) . These question pertain patient ' health care , ask patient Jefferson Headache center chronic headache routinely office visit .
